fields.name: Name
fields.label: Label
fields.noEmptyString: Empty string value is not allowed
fields.currentUserAsDefault: Set current user as default value
fields.useDisabledTextareaInViewMode: Use disabled textarea in view mode

messages.thousandSeparatorEqualsDecimalMark: The thousands separator character can not be the same as the decimal point character.
messages.selectEntityType: Select the entity type in the left menu.
messages.selectLayout: Select the layout in the left menu and edit it.
messages.incorrectThousandSeparatorOrDecimalMark: Only the following delimiters are allowed: '.' and ','.
messages.rebuildDb: Are you sure you want to rebuild the database structure? All unused columns and tables will be removed.

descriptions.locale: Manage locale settings such as language, date and time format, decimal separator, thousand separator, as well as locale-specific measure units.
descriptions.composer: Update the system and all installed modules, install or remove publicly or privately available modules. Module version dependency is automatically considered.
descriptions.measure: Manage your measures and measure units, set default measure units and multipliers for automatic measure unit conversion.
descriptions.connection: Manage connections with other systems for an automatic data exchange.
descriptions.settings: Manage general system settings such as default system locale, search preferences, active interface languages, cache usage and more...
descriptions.scheduledJob: Manage scheduled system jobs, like a cron job, executed in the background and see their logs.
descriptions.clearCache: Clear metadata cache and other system cache, use this option if you have errors while working with the system.
descriptions.rebuildDb: Align the database structure in accordance with the configured metadata.
descriptions.users: Manage system users, their preferences, roles and teams as well as validate their access level and permissions for all entities.
descriptions.teams: Manage teams and user assignment to teams.
descriptions.roles: Manage roles – set permissions to create, read, write and delete records, define access levels (own, team-related or all records) for all entities in the system, define specific permissions for single fields.
descriptions.portals: Manage portals to give limited access to your system and data to external collaborators – photographs, translators, suppliers, distributors, customers, retailers and others.
descriptions.portalRoles: Manage portal roles – set permissions to create, read, update and delete records, define access levels (own, account-related or all records) for entities, available in a portal, define specific permissions for single fields.
descriptions.portalUsers: Manage portal users, their preferences, portal roles, portals and accounts.
descriptions.outboundEmails: Set SMTP server settings for outgoing emails.
descriptions.layoutManager: Manage standard system layouts for (side) list view, (side) detail view, relation panels and their sorting order, mass update, etc.
descriptions.entityManager: Configure your data model – manage pre-configured and create new entities of different types (base, hierarchy), manage their configurations, fields of different types (there are more than 20 field types available), and relations (many-to-many, one-to-many, many-to-one) between entities as well as define dynamic logic conditions for making fields visible, read-only or required.
descriptions.userInterface: Select your theme, configure main navigation items, default dashboards and entities, available for quick create as well as manage other settings for user interfaces.
descriptions.authTokens: Investigate active authorization sessions, including users' IP address and last access date and time.
descriptions.currency: Select currencies to be used, set default currency settings, define base currency and currency exchange rates
descriptions.notifications: Manage settings for in-app and email notifications.
descriptions.actionHistory: See the history of all user actions in the system, including username, target data record, action type, IP address, access date and time.
descriptions.labelManager: Manage label translations for pre-selected languages, push your translations for the review by AtroCore team as well as reset your translations to default values.
descriptions.attachments: Manage all files (attachments) stored in the system.
